tasks.command: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && source "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use && npm run prettier:fix && npm run all
tasks.label: npm: prettier:fix and all
tasks.detail: Runs prettier:fix and then test:coverage, prettier:check, type-check, and lint

tasks.command: npm run prettier:fix && npm run all && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push origin $(git branch --show-current) --force
tasks.label: Prettify and Force Push
tasks.detail: Formats code, runs tests, amends the current commit and force pushes
